Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a notice on advertisements of immigration assistance services and increasing penalties for violations of requirements that apply to immigration assistance services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring a notice on advertisements of immigration assistance services and increasing penalties for violations of requirements that apply to immigration assistance services.

Items.Title: Resolution condemning the Trump Administration for disappearing immigrants to prisons in other countries.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Condemning the Trump Administration for disappearing immigrants to prisons in other countries.
